content.detailedDescription:
On the night of august 4 2011 i saw flying lights at around 845 pm in kingman arizona. i was driving down the road and i was facing east. i saw 4 strange lights in a weird pattern i decided that something was not right so i knew the road i was on went out into the desert so i went about 5 miles out of town and now there was 8 lights in the sky in different patterns from horizontal lines to rectangles to circles. as soon as i got to the desert there was another car already out there and one soon showed up and then a few minutes later there was 4-5 cars including mine. having a truck and it being the desert i went out as far as i could and i go to i would say about 2 miles away. i was standing lights of and i knew they were not airplanes because they were just sitting there but being so close i also didn���������t hear any helicopter noises  i took a bunch of pictures and the last one was when they were in a rectangle and then they started to circle the city it seemed and then they all started going towards the ground and where most of them flew i knew there was departments so i decided to head out that way and i think i saw one on the ground but as soon as i parked my car a cop seemed to appear out of nowhere and he asked me if i had a problem i responded if i was trespassing and he said i wasn���������t and so i started to tell him about the lights and showed him the pictures. he then proceeded to tell me that there are new aircraft that hover and don���������t make noise but i haven���������t heard of anything like that. i said i should go and he goes good idea and as i was turning my car around he turned left to go where the lights had seemed to land. the whole cop thing seemed rather suspicious and it just didn���������t feel right i was out in the middle of nowhere and i didn���������t even see him coming but take that for what it is worth. i then went home and looked up the number to call and report i tried calling a couple of times and it was busy and then i started to see the lights again this time they were heading south and they were in a horizontal formation i went had gotten gas and that���������s when i tried take more pictures and only one came out and it seems really weird. when i was looking at the lights i was able to get through and the person told me to try and get as many people to look and report. i got in my car and started to head south but they just seemed to disappear rather quickly i saw them and then i didn���������t see them i tried waiting around but then i had to be somewhere at midnight that is why i am writing the report so late. i will include pics in the email and try and describe them. the lights every time i saw them where just white and they did blink but only sometimes and i didn���������t see any other color. also no noise at all and moved methodically 




i have 10 pics 1 video
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo sighting kingman az

content.detailedDescription: Two friends and i were at my house in golden beach, md. we went outside to smoke a cigarette when we observed the ufo. i was unsure of what the object was at first, and came to the conclusion that it had to be some time of unidentified flying object that was under intelligent control. the object itself was a white-ish, blue-ish, orange-ish sphere/oval of light. it moved west above us, and moved very slowly. we could observe the object pulsating light and sometimes flickering. the three of us were dumbfounded upon realizing what we were seeing. the object eventually faded away in it's western path.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orb-like ufo spotted over golden beach.

content.detailedDescription: I was letting my dog out at around 4:20 am on august 5 of 2011, my dog began to bark looking up and growling. i looked up and first i thought it was a star, i got my dog inside and turned around the object was now in a differant spot in the sky. i went inside and retrieved my binoculours i looked at the object and it was moving very slowly i could see it and it had a very bright orange almost whitish glow to it, i became scared it had some kind of wierd symbols on the underside, it acted like it knew i was there and looked like it was getting closer, i ran inside at that same time i heard a helicopter coming i looked again off my porch the helicopter was close the object, the object dissapeared and the helicopter stayed in the area for around 10 minutes and left this happens almost every night some times there is more than one object there is a power line tower in my neighbors back yeard that is where the object appears to hover over.
content.summary: Very bright with some kind of symbols on the underside

content.detailedDescription:
ufo

a night in summer 2009, out of curiosity wants to look at the outside so i left opened curtains
suddenly found a ufo above directly in front of the house, it is the dishes, no smoke-emitting below, there is a row of lights flashing light looks a little bright,
overall look a bit small, i watched when you were about to take a camera, ufo flew away
content.summary: Smaller hover a row of lamps with light ufo

content.detailedDescription: My friends and i were hanging out, when something caught our eyes at almost the same exact time. it was an orange/white pulsing bright orb that was moving about twice, if not three times as fast as an airplane, and it had a straight line direction heading north. it was pretty low to the ground; anywhere from 30 to 70 feet above ground. as soon as the silent object flew north into the thick tree line, a police officer pulled up. we described what we just saw, and the officer has seen the same exact thing before. he said he's seen it twice, once hovering over the high school, then moving off north in a hurry. the other time he claimed to have followed it north through town, and when it reached the tree line and disappeared from sight, a "black helicopter" started hovering around. then he proceeded to tell us that it could just be ball lightning. it was not ball lightning: nothing around or under it was affected by the light, and there was no sound whatsoever.
content.summary: Bright orange, possibly white pulsing orb moved across sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was at that time a police officer of 6 years, had a commercial/instrument pilots license with approx. 400 hours/majority of time flying southern ca, and was a 10 year navy veteran whom had seen all navy aircraft and majority of air force planes.   

i went outside my motorhome at approx. 7 am to walk my dog.  it was overcast with very fine mist. i always looked at el cajon mountain. i could see the approx. lower two thirds of the mountain.

while i was looking at the mountain i saw an unknown craft descending through the overcast. from what i could see, it looked like i could see approx. one fifth of a spherical object. it was tannish brown in color. i could see what looked two levels of what looked two windows and a hanger deck off set from each other. the part of the craft i could see blocked out one third of el cajon mountain. i could see a partial shadow of the craft. the craft hovered for approx. two minutes.  it then slowly ascended. throughout the sighting i could hear no sound from the craft. the craft looked like no flying object i had ever seen and behaved like no plane or hot air balloon. i lost sight of the craft when ascended above the overcast level.


i was awe struck at the sight and size of the craft. i could not believe that a craft of that size could move so gracefully and quietly.
content.summary: Craft descended/hovered/ascended/no noise. was spherical/ball shaped. looked like windows&hanger bay.

content.detailedDescription: I was eight-or-so years old, laying in a tent in my backyard. the night was suprisingly starry. the ufo appered as a star. the ufo was about the size of a golf ball from my point of view. the ufo was to the right of the moon about two fist sizes. it started to move slowly to the left. when it just got past the moon, it bolted to the right and went behind the moon.
content.summary: Spherical, glowing, and slow.

content.detailedDescription: I was eight-or-so years old, laying in a tent in my backyard. the night was suprisingly starry. the ufo appered as a star. the ufo was about the size of a golf ball from my point of view. the ufo was to the right of the moon about two fist sizes. it started to move slowly to the left. when it just got past the moon, it bolted to the right and went behind the moon.
content.summary: Spherical, glowing, and slow.

content.detailedDescription: I was eight-or-so years old, laying in a tent in my backyard. the night was suprisingly starry. the ufo appered as a star. the ufo was about the size of a golf ball from my point of view. the ufo was to the right of the moon about two fist sizes. it started to move slowly to the left. when it just got past the moon, it bolted to the right and went behind the moon.
content.summary: Spherical, glowing, and slow.

content.detailedDescription: They look like stars but falling stars dont stop and shot out of space in matter of seconds
content.summary: There was three it looked like falling stars then stopped and shot backup like a check mark all three

content.detailedDescription: Lights were over the peacock mtn. lots of people watching cars driving to get closer.  everyone was excited.  lights  zooming back and forth, hovering, getting extremely bright, then dim.  like fighting or playing in the sky.  one by one they got dim and moved off toward the north.
content.summary: A dozen or more lights

content.detailedDescription: Taking photos at 200am with a cannon camera facing the southeast, camera set for 10 seconds with a 4 second exposure.........Just wondering what it might be, tripod was not hit or moved, you can tell by the backgroud stars that it was in focus and not moved, these showed up in 3 frames. i have a satalite tracking across the sky and a airplane, was not a lighting bug, it would have been way out of focus. just can,t imagine what it could be, would be great, if you could identify this for me. because i am clueless as to what it could be. wasn,t anything on the lenes, you can tell it was moving in an odd way............Thanks jds
content.summary: Photografing night sky, it was on 3 of my photos, i was taking pictures of the southeast, camers was timed for 10 seconds with a 4 second exposure, with a cannon camera

content.detailedDescription: We were driving home from a friends wedding in snohomish wa. it was about 9:40pm 07/31/2011, when i noticed some lights through some trees. we were driving west on 132nd towards mill creek, wa just past 35th. as we passed the trees the view was then clear. we saw 3 orangeish redish pulsating circular objects. we pulled the car over and got out our digital camera and took some viedo. the ojects seemed to be made of light. then light would surge from time to time. they were not flying perfetly in sync, they would alternatly speed up and slow down but maintain elevation. their movements were very fluid and smooth. there was no noise what so ever. then one at a time they zoomed off and disappeared. we stopped recording and started discussing what we had just saw. very frusterated that all these cars were just driving right past, no one was stopping to watch. then to our surprise we looked back to the nw wherethe objects had come from and there were 3 more of the same objects heading in the same direction. we fumbled around trying to find the camera in the car and when i started the second video i was recording from behind the wind sheild i handed off the camera to my boyfriend who then record from outside the car. right after he gets focused on the lights you can see one of them move very quickly away from the other and then move slightly back towards it. unfortunately we were not able to catch most of the second wave on camera. it was a very strange event espesially because we were lucky enough to have some daylight left so it was clear that these lights were not attached to any sort of aircraft.
content.summary: 2 sets of 3 glowing orange circular objects---- 2 videos!!!

content.detailedDescription: Long and pulsating
content.summary: Not seen before

content.detailedDescription:
It was 4 am and i was laying awake in the front room of our house.
i noticed an amber light in sky, first thinking it was the moon, then when i saw it moving, a plane.
 
stepped outside to get a better look. 
from what i could make out, object looked very large, triangular in shape,with two amber colored lights with two beams stretching away from them with two beams stretching away from each of them on each side.
the lights were all the same amber/golden color. 
the object made a slight "hum" sound.
i witnessed the object move sideways, then forwards. it flew realitively slowly over our horse farm and over our house.
light pattern remained the same.
once object was past our house. light pattern changed to only 3 solid amber lights and then the object disappeared from sight.

i am a pilot and can identify planes flying at night.
there was no indication that this was a plane of any kind, nor was it a helicopter.
there was hardly any sound at all.

i kept thinking that if i watched it long enough i'd figure out what it was, so did not run in to get camera. 

this was unlike anything i have ever seen.
content.summary: Noticed amber light in sky, thought was plane, but light pattern was very different, ship seemed very large, triangular. moved sideways, then forwards over our farm and house and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Please stop now..............

While sitting on my back screened in portch with my wife and adult son, we all at 9:35 p.M. saw in an instant approximately a mile or more away at approximately one o'clock position saw a very bright round self illuminated object which was very bright amber in color with a single large red light clearly visable on top. it appeared with no movement hovered and simply blinked out. my wife and son and i all then looked at each other and said, what the hell was that?, i have seen many airplanes from orlando international in the past and an aviation buff, flight simulator etc. and know that this was not an airplane. my son to confirm this thought that may be it was an airplane that cut through the clouds, he went out in the yard and there were no clouds, i have seen thousands of flights incoming over many years and know of all the required faa lights that are required, this object had no blinking lights and they were to bright and of the wrong color to match any conventional lights as i stated i have ever seen. in addition, you can easily hear cessna 172 type airplanes that i have seen from here from further distances.
  the sighting was due west between poinciana and haines city, florida.
i believe it was over the lake marion area next to much rural wild life management areas. i am an active sky watcher and am 51 years old have seen many meteorites and many fireballs, three last year in fact that were spectacular, this matches nothing i have ever seen in my life. 
the sighting as stated, lasted for about 6-10 seconds, enough time for all of us to notice it and look at each other and then look back and it did not appear to accelerate it simply appeared to implode into itself and simply blink out without a sound, no trail etc.
content.summary: Intense amber round orb or craft with very bright red light on top witnessed by my wife, my son, i.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in key largo with my son shark fishing from a dock at the hotel we were staying at around 11:00pm, the seafarer hotel in key largo. there were 2 adult women and 2 other children there as well.

we had just put some dog food into the gulf of mexico water for chum, and placed 2 fishing baits into the water. after getting all set up, he and i laid down on the dock and were staring at the sky looking for satellites. we spotted one almost immediately crossing the sky directly over head. a few minutes later my son hooked a 4+ foot lemon shark and successfully got it up the dock. we released it, reset the bait and cast the rod out into the water. again, i lay down on the dock to see if i could spot another satellite for my son and spent probably 30 minutes starring at the zenith of the sky with no success. it was very clear with a cloud now and again floating by. suddenly from my left (the west south west) i saw a large, quick moving object shaped like a chevron, making absolutely no sound, fly right across my direct vision, blocking the star light as it passed, and having what i think were maybe 5 or 6 white lights that were not blinking and ran along the bottom of the object. i immediately jumped to my feet, pointed at it and started to yell to everybody to take notice... it moved quickly, steadily not changing speed or direction and completely soundless, and it was out of my view in probably 5 to 7 seconds -- but it was as real as anything i have ever seen. i was in total amazement.

one of the other children there said he had seen it and my son said he caught view of it as it disappeared to what would have been the far right or the north easterly sky.
content.summary: Boomerang chevron shape not rounded but straight edges and sharp corners

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my house inside my lounge eating my lunch when after around 10-15 minutes of sitting watching tv i noticed something in the corner of my eye which immediately caught my attention. the houses on my street are detached and the one which the object came over was a bungalow on the other side of the road. the object itself caught my attention because it was huge there is no word to describe the size of the object it was probably around 50 metres above the house across the road. 
the moment i saw the object i felt a chill run down my spine and almost felt inferior in some way, i had felt fine all day but all of a sudden i felt sick and scared and was sick due to this object. the object itself was a really strange shape is was the shape of a dohnut or as mathematics call it a "torus". the object itself seemed to be a silvery/greyish colour and fully resemble an object which is constructed out of a very shiny reflective metal. 
as i started to video the object after i had ran for my camera the object seemed to be spinning vertically and horizontally but also seemed to change direction to the opposite of what it was o-ready doing which baffled me the most. then the object appeared to be vibrating and shaking but at the same time slightly swirling on a rotation of the y axis but as the object rotated it seemed to have an indent/piece chipped away at one. the object at times was affected by other objects which were surrounding it as these smaller objects would speed up causing the bigger object to react by doing the same. then the object appeared to just casually fly away until it just literally vanished without a trace.
at the time of the sighting i felt extremely scared(the most i've ever been) and also got an adrenaline rush like the worst i have ever had one. i noticed that the moment i saw the object that i went very cold and began to feel sick/ill and later on i was actually sick i also kept feeling chills going up my spine. after the sighting i was so mesmerized that the sighting is literally burnt into my memory i saw this 2 years ago but can remember like it was yesterday i also noticed that i was having an hard time sleeping due to this object and it seemed to have really caused some harm to me psychologically as it was constantly on my mind and if i went out with my friends i couldn't really get into the conversation this object was all i could think of.
i first lost sight of the object just after i stopped videoing as the object was too far away for my camera zoom, i noticed that the object just more or less vanished out of sight.

i would be very great full if you read all this and could give me some info on what this object really was. oh sorry for changing the audio on my video as it was just me breathing heavily i just thought a peaceful song would make it look better.
content.summary: Strange silver doughnut shaped craft which opposes gravity

content.detailedDescription: This was a long time ago but i have never forgotten it. i was coming home from work, i left work at approximately 3am. i was nearing my house begining to go up a very steep hill when i saw what i thought was the moon in my rear view mirror. as i started up the hill the object became larger i felt very afraid for some reason and i thought it was chasing me so i went faster, the last thing i remember was approaching the middle of the hill. the next thing i remember, i was at the top of the hill and my car was stopped but still running. there were about 6 or 7 small children standing in front of my car laughing at me then they ran off into the woods, i could see they were naked. i remember thinking it was odd that a group of children would be in the middle of the street naked at 4am. when i arrived home the sun was up i am not sure what time it was but the entire drive should have taken 20 mins and it was summer the sun doesn't come up till after 5 am. the beings i saw only came to about a head over my cars hood i thought they were 5 or 6 years old. i still shake when i think about this experience and i still don't know why.
content.summary: Little child like beings standing in fron of my car

content.detailedDescription: The first night, which was sunday, i sat outside for several hours and saw 12 'falling stars' and several of the ones that apear starlike but pulsate several colors though they stay realtively stationary. monday i woke up around 12 and to see if there was anything going on. i went outside and found several of the starlike ones, but much closer and brighter and moving, when i first got out there there were probably 5- 10 that i could see in the sky overall. i watched them and then an extremely bright light illumitaded the entire tree line and slowly rose out never ceasing its light. its movements were very deliberate and remained. it appeared blimp shaped and it did seem to make a slight steady hum. it rose to about 5 feet over the trees would slowly come towards me and then move back, but not side to side. it shon the light only on the trees, never directly at me. after about fifteen minutes of this its light was turned off and within seconds a cross shaped object flashing everycolor very brightly and moving fast in all directions inclueing cirular replaced it. it came closer to me but mainly just hovered above the treeline. it was joined after about half an hour by another one, slightly smaller and though flashing maintained a prodominatly orange color, also crossshaped. after a period of time i looked around the rest of the sky and realized that about fifteen to twenty of the starlike ones were present, all with the flashing lights of many colors but could pass as one if not being looked for. there was also a larger one and i dont really know what shape it was, it was farther away, higher in the sky. though staying in a general direction it moved about in all direction, though remained stedy, not irratic as the crossshaped ones had, orwith the wobble/slight wander of the starlike ones. it appeared as though a helichopter approached it at one point but the larger object came at it. it may not have been a helichopter at all as it may have docked on it but it was the approximate size of one with a light such as one may have. i turned my attention back to the crosslike ones. the brighter bigger one wass still above the treeline, slightly less active. the orangish one had moved away from it but was still very noticeable. i watched them for awhile, then turned back ot the one that had docked/absorbed the item, which was still there. there was now another much larger one, i think its lights were red, but it had a bluish color. this one, maybe three time, shot down blue spheres, which i never saw return to it. finally i decided to try to get some sleep, so i went in. i was excited though so i went back out after about thirty minutes. there was a massive amount of the starlike ones throughout the sky, the crosslike ones were still there, and several sphers had joined them. but something i had never seen were two things that appeared to be only foggy light. the one near the treeline was largeish and possibly triangular, more blue than green. the other one, huge was possibly an entity, as it appeared to walk up steps at one point but maintained no shape. when i went in there were up to at least 30, varying in size and shape. i am rushed for time now but i feel it is very important to state that this is the army of the lord, and very very soon everyone will know they are here. i will add more later if i can edit it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Though not the first i have seen, certianly the most and nightly

content.detailedDescription: I was lying on the couch at my sons house, i was house sitting, there was a storm then the storm passed and i fell asleep. i woke up to the house shaking like an earthquake, when i looked out the sliding glass doors i thought it was daytime except the light was exceptionally bright like looking at the sun but you could see through it. i could see the entire back yard about 1/4 or so of an acre. in a few seconds the light disappeared and it was night, everything was dark and i felt like i was in shock or couldn't move or think i just layed back down on the couch and went to sleep but i felt it was really strange almost dream like. i haven't been able to stop thinking about it and wondered if anyone reported anything in manchester on july the 7th or 6th. i do have another experience that is really old that i have never talked about, i will also fill out a form on that one because i am not sure which experience cathy wanted me to report.
content.summary: Bright light that i could see through with an earthquake effect to the house.

content.detailedDescription:
This is my follow up to another report i just submitted.  in my first report i was standing on a property line when i was watching a ufo, well, about a week and a half later i was standing 15 yards from that property line facing the other direction when me and my friend, a wall sitting skeptic, saw a star, slightly lower and brighter than other the other stars, that was flickering and changing colors dramatically in the tree line, we could see it between the green of some trees but it's background was still the night sky.  i had recently downloaded skyview, the app that let's you hold up your phone and look up specific stars, planets, and satellites, but it wouldn't calibrate and i couldn't use it. the light on the "thing" was flickering, seemingly randomly, in different colors; white, red, and a blueish-green-turquoise color. i took the case off of my iphone and tried skyview again and it worked perfectly.  it was sitting right where scorpio's head is, but i couldn't see any other star of scorpio and i was still suspicious. it was blinking so fast it was hard to tell anything about it.  after a little bit of time it started to move calmly but violently in different directions (up, down, slinging from point to point very quickly in a small area, but kept a base in the spot).  my friend and i got into his car, which we were standing very close to already, and drove up the street about 80 yards (towards the light, though, it was out of sight) where the road turns right.  we went up the road about another 30 yards and took a left.  went another 20 yards or so and pulled into a public parking lot.  we got out and tried to find but couldn't at first.  i walked around in the lot trying to get a glimpse when i spotted it way closer to the ground than either of us had thought. it was over a clearing with a few small houses and a close to dried up creek, probably 20 yards from that first right turn we made.  we drove back to my house and had to stand further back than we did earlier to see it, as it had either dropped or moved away. we lost track of it soon after, we couldn't see it at all.

i submit these reports because i've had 2 different experiences very close to me in less than 2 weeks.  i've had 2 other instances in the last last 7-8 months, but neither of those was this close to me.
content.summary: Ufo hotspot? 2nd ufo sighted in wimberley, tx less than one mile away from the last one spotted here

content.detailedDescription:
I was simply taking a picture of a blimp and an airplane. didn't notice anything else while taking the shot.

not willing to post the image for fear it will be stolen. i will however physically show it to anyone interested.

would like to have it analyzed by a professional.
content.summary: Distorted cloud like with three identifiable black surrounding objects

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from a friends house with 2 other friends at about 4 am.  i remember looking at the clock in my car on the way home and seeing 4:00 exactly, so it was probably 4:08 when i first noticed it.  when i pulled onto my street an extremely bright star caught my eye over the tree line somewhere behind the end of my street, a dead end- at my neighbors house.  i didn't bring it up to my friends because they get tired of me talking about the sky, and i know that and didn't think too much of this star, anyway. though, by the time i parked i though it may of been venus.  i pulled into our car port (perpendicular to, and facing away from the street- for detail) but i was still looking at the thing, that had apparently moved behind us, still over the tree line, but really bright. i told my friends i was gonna stay out here and they should too, but when i turned to look at them, they were already inside.  so i walked onto the street, right on the property line between me and my neighbor and that's when i realized that i couldn't see any other stars anywhere near it because it was below the clouds and way bigger than a star.  the moon was behind the clouds at this time of night and was illuminating them tremendously. i remember seeing the clouds moving surprisingly fast, as it was very still that night. the big sphere of light started to pulsate very slowly but on a big scale. at it's dimmest i could clearly make out 3 lights in an equilateral triangle on the bottom of something, but i couldn't completely distinguish the craft. it was either round or possibly a circle that was slimmed down to a more triangular shape but kept the rounded edges. it's still hard to tell how far away it was, but the more i think about and stand in the same spot i realize that it had to have been closer than i initially thought. anyway, at it's brightest it was completely engulfed by and centered in what looked like a perfect sphere of light. it hovered and went through a full cycle starting at it's brightest and ending at it's brightest. i was facing northeast and after 1 cycle it moved left to right fairly slowly but very smoothly, while keeping the brightest on, stopped again and made 2 cycles and stopped at it's brightest.  i called my friend inside that does believe in et's, ufo's, and such (as do i), but he either didn't hear or understand me because he never came outside.  the ufo moved slightly to the right again, stopped, and made one more cycle. after that cycle it moved slowly behind the trees to the right and i couldn't get another view of it.  the clouds were moving really fast against the ufo's path the entire time.  

at the time i knew the camera lens on my iphone 4 is very scratched up and wouldn't have gotten anything that looked like anything, and the reverse camera would've meant looking away from the ufo for longer than i wanted too.  my actual camera was in my room dead, the battery charger was stolen from a hotel room. so i tried to get a witness but both candidates were too tired.  i thought this was a really cool sighting, being someone who believes in and studies these things, but i decided to report it when 1 1/2 weeks later, while standing about 20 yards from the other sighting and facing the other direction almost 180 degrees, me and the more skeptical friend of the 2 in the other sighting (the one i didn't call), saw something else in the sky that was completely different and cured his skepticism.  i will detail this sighting in a second report soon.
content.distance: 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile, Unknown
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Pulsating ufo spotted in wimberley, tx.

content.detailedDescription:
(january 28, 1977)



ufo experience (phenomena)

tuesday january 18, 1977

  at 5:45 p.M. i left my parents home located in east providence destination 195 east to tiverton, r.I. for the coachman restaurant, 

1143 main road. also had an appointment at 8:45 p.M. in the area.

  while driving on 195 east & being a ufo enthusiast, i automatically scan the sky searching for the brightest stars. i spotted two that were unusually bright and concentrated on them for a while. one of the stars was located above the fall river area & the other in north tiverton on the opposite side of the expressway or in relation to the braga bridge on the right. all of a sudden, as i was passing through somerset, the star spurted directly over to the northern section of fall river with acceleration faster than any jet iv'e ever seen. next i thought maybe i am hallucinating. to myself, i indicated, if the object shoots back across the highway again its got to be a ufo! sure enough two or three seconds later it went to the opposite side. i was absolutely overwhelmed!

  then i noticed the spacecraft, glowing like a star, continue in a north east direction over the braga bridge. i prepared to exit 14s heading for tiverton on route 24, looked up and could see the ufo on my left heading for tiverton. then i noticed it cross over route 24 to the opposite side of the highway on my right, it seem to hover there for a short time. after about 5 minutes i could see the craft on my left just before exiting route 24 and on to route 138 main road.

  upon entering the parking lot at the coachman i decided to park as close as possible to the entrace due to the extremely inclement weather. i parked about 25 feet from the entrance in the direction of the restaurant.

  i opened the door, looked at my watch which indicated 6:20 p.M. stept out and looked up-to my astonishment there before my eyes at a distance of

  i had this tremendous feeling of being at peace with myself for some unknown reason.

  a couple of minutes later my guest drove into the parking lot. i ran to her door, opened it and told her to look up and she said, what a bright star! i said, this is a ufo. we watched for another minute but because it was so cold outside we ran to the entrance.

  our table was situated in the back of the dining room facing the bay with a direct view of bristol, looking southwest i could see the lighted mt. hope bridge. we looked up and we could see the object, it was in constant observation throughout the diner meal. at approximately 7:45 p.M. the craft moved about 100 feet, both of us witnessed this activity and and of course i stated, do you believe in ufo's now? she answered rather abruptly, i always thought this was possible but firmly believe now. at about 8:10 p.M. the ufo maneuvered itself straight across to bristol, disapeared, reappeared and stopped in the center of the bay for ten minutes, then finally left our view at 8:20 p.M. in the direction of bristol.

  we departed from the coachman at 8:45 p.M., my guest left in the opposite direction and i proceeded to an appointment on the main road.



ufo experience (phenomena)

wednesday january 19, 1977



  decided wednesday night i would attempt a repeat performance of tuesday night by driving to tiverton then to my sister's home in portsmouth. with camera & binoculars i left my parents home for tiverton at 6:40 p.M.

  while driving on 195 east to route 24 south at approximately 7:00 p.M., the ufo was now travelling on my left and traversing back & forth over the highway. i did not exit the coachman route 138 but instead continued to portsmouth and lost all activity at this point.



thursday january 20, 1977



  at 8:15 a.M. while waiting for a bus to providence i felt a sharp pain on the right side of my forehead. this condition continued until lunchtime at 12:00 p.M. when i felt nauseated and delayed my lunch for forty minutes until it subsided. went to lunch at 12:40 feeling a little dizzy, this persisted until 2:30 p.M. that day.

  i understand after close contact or exposure this reaction can occur.



friday january 21, 1977



  it was a very cloudy night and at 6:25 p.M. on route 24 south to portsmouth, i noticed in north tiverton, on my right above the clouds, this bright light moving across the highway to the opposite side and hovered there. i continued to portsmouth.



tuesday january 25, 1977



  this was a clear night at 7:35 p.M. on route 24 south to main road tiverton for an appointment, my father & i noticed at a distance of about 1500 feet in the sky, a bright star (ufo) hovering for a few seconds then it completely vanished.



  this summerizes my ufo experiences for the past two weeks. in every sighting indicated within this report i never saw the metallic portion of the ufo, the craft was always engulfed completely with a white glow

  i must say that it has been a fantastic experience and of course i look foward to the future with great anticipation.





				sincerely yours,
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: About 150 feet in the sky glowing white oval shaped object brighter than a fluorescent light, it hovered without moving or making a sound.

content.detailedDescription: Was scary...That day it was proved that we are not alone in this universe after all are we.?
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change

content.summary: Scary

content.detailedDescription: I live in belfast on the east coast of ireland,i live in a street of terrace homes the street is about half mile long,on my way home one night in late november 1973,as i got near my home my neighbour was standing at her door,she said,to me what is that in the sky above the houses,well my god,the sight of this thing in the sky,it was unreal massive it was beautiful,i only seen the back quarter of it witch was massive it cover a good part of the street,cant understand how i did not see it walking home.It was a good clear night & the sight of it just sitting there hanging in the sky.It was kind of hollow underbelly with dim lite lights & the same around the out side like portholes,i seen a small bit of it so what size was it.After about five minutes it shot of north wards in the blink of the eye.It was like that spacecraft in close encounters.  ps,from that time,i have seen cigar shape,,& the flashing lights matter of fact the lights followed me for a few days it put on a display of shooting up & down growing larger then shrinking,i was driveing a school bus at the time and all the kids saw this to.
content.summary: Just like the film, close encounter mush the same.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my parked car in the driveway talking on my cell phone to a close friend. my car was facing due south and i was looking ahead through the front windshield while having my conversation. at around 1:45am, approximately, i saw what i initially thought to be a bright meteor pass by low on the horizon, just below the treetops in the foreground at the edge of my yard from my viewpoint. at first i assumed the object had burnt up in the same second that i noticed it, because my view of it was obstructed by the thick woods. there is however a break in the woods where the privite road that i live on comes down to my driveway from 17 highway, which provides a clear due south view placing the apparent horizon from where i was sitting at least a mile away, on the other side of highway 17. after noticing and losing sight of the object behind the foreground trees the first time, it re-emerged a couple of seconds later as it passed through this clearing over the private road. i was able to track the object with my eyes as it continued moving from west to east, and i lost it behind the other patch of woods on the far side of the private road, continuing to catch glimpses of it between the folliage. the object was unusual because it moved with the speed of a meteor and looked like one, but did not lose altidude or burn up for the whole 5-8 seconds that it took for it to pass accross my field of view. i would compare the exact look and apparent size of this object to that of a bright star or planet on an exceptionally clear night. i have no way of telling how far away the object was but i assume it passed over arkansas somewhere, because my residence is only a few miles from the arkansas-missouri border. another note: this may be unrelated, but a large jet with three lights on the bottom (i assume a commercial jet) passed directly over me within a couple of minutes of my sighting, and it was headed southeast, so i know the pilots had to have seen what i saw. also, highway 17 has a four or five mile straight stretch facing directly south with open fields on both sides before you get to my house, so if anyone was traveling south on that highway around that time, they had to have seen the object. i was unable to find any other reports of this from anyone else, so i decided to be the first to file it.
content.summary: Basically looked like a meteor that did not burn up, slow down, or lose altitude.
